name: Door and Dice
description:
You decide to make a gamble and play a game. HOW TO PLAY

Every room will have a door and dice, and every door in every room has a chance to be the exit door. To increase that chance you must enter a door or collect a die. Time when to collect the die carefully to increase the chance more. Collecting a Red die increases the chance 2 times more than the normal die. Also, there's a timer that's constantly counting down in almost every room, and if you let it reach zero you lose. You can increase the amount of time you have left by 2 if you enter a door.

CONTROLS

A / Left / D / Right - Left & Right Movement

W / Up - Jump

Space - Enter Door
